recipe1.name: Methi Thepla (Low-Fat)
recipe1.description: Nutritious Gujarati flatbread made with fenugreek leaves, whole wheat flour, and mild spices. Ideal for diabetic-friendly diets.

ingredients.name: Whole Wheat Flour
ingredients.description: Fiber-rich flour used as a base for healthy flatbreads like thepla.

ingredients.name: Fresh Methi Leaves
ingredients.description: Fenugreek leaves packed with fiber and blood sugar-lowering properties.

ingredients.name: Low-Fat Curd
ingredients.description: Helps soften the thepla and adds a tangy flavor, suitable for diabetics.

ingredients.name: Ajwain (Carom Seeds)
ingredients.description: Aids digestion and adds aroma to thepla.

ingredients.name: Turmeric Powder
ingredients.description: Anti-inflammatory spice that enhances flavor and color.

recipe2.name: Moong Dal Chilla
recipe2.description: Protein-packed savory Indian pancakes made with moong dal and mild spices. A perfect low-GI meal for diabetics.

ingredients.name: Yellow Moong Dal
ingredients.description: Split yellow lentils rich in protein and low in carbs, ideal for diabetic meals.

ingredients.name: Onion
ingredients.description: Fresh onions add crunch and flavor to the chilla batter.

ingredients.name: Green Chilli
ingredients.description: Adds mild spice and flavor; optional based on preference.

ingredients.name: Coriander Leaves
ingredients.description: Fresh herbs that add aroma and taste, while being low in calories.

ingredients.name: Cumin Seeds
ingredients.description: Helps digestion and gives earthy flavor to chilla batter.

recipe3.name: Oats Upma with Vegetables
recipe3.description: A fiber-rich, low-GI breakfast made with rolled oats and fresh vegetables. Perfect for diabetic-friendly meal planning.

ingredients.name: Rolled Oats
ingredients.description: Whole grain oats high in fiber and ideal for managing blood sugar levels.

ingredients.name: Carrot
ingredients.description: Chopped fresh carrots add crunch, color, and beta-carotene.

ingredients.name: Green Peas
ingredients.description: Naturally sweet and fiber-rich, perfect for healthy upma.

ingredients.name: Mustard Seeds
ingredients.description: Tempering spice that adds sharp flavor to upma.

ingredients.name: Curry Leaves
ingredients.description: Fresh aromatic leaves that add flavor and aid digestion.

recipe4.name: Ragi Dosa
recipe4.description: Crispy and healthy South Indian dosa made from ragi flour, ideal for diabetics due to its low glycemic index and high fiber content.

ingredients.name: Ragi Flour
ingredients.description: Finger millet flour rich in calcium and fiber, helps regulate blood sugar.

ingredients.name: Rice Flour
ingredients.description: Used in small quantity for crispiness in dosa batter.

ingredients.name: Curd (Low-Fat)
ingredients.description: Helps ferment the batter and adds mild tangy flavor.

ingredients.name: Cumin Seeds
ingredients.description: Adds flavor and aids digestion, common in dosa preparations.

ingredients.name: Green Chilli
ingredients.description: Optional for mild heat and sharpness in dosa batter.

recipe5.name: Lauki (Bottle Gourd) Curry
recipe5.description: Light, hydrating, and low-calorie curry made from bottle gourd. Ideal for managing blood sugar

ingredients.name: Bottle Gourd (Lauki)
ingredients.description: A hydrating and fibrous vegetable with low glycemic index, perfect for diabetic meals.

ingredients.name: Tomato
ingredients.description: Fresh tomatoes add tang and nutrition to the curry base.

ingredients.name: Ginger-Garlic Paste
ingredients.description: Aromatic base ingredient used to enhance flavor and aid digestion.

ingredients.name: Cumin Seeds
ingredients.description: Tempering spice that adds earthy flavor and aids digestion.

ingredients.name: Turmeric Powder
ingredients.description: Anti-inflammatory spice that adds color and health benefits.

recipe6.name: Quinoa Upma
recipe6.description: Protein-rich breakfast made with quinoa and vegetables. High in fiber and essential amino acids.

ingredients.name: Quinoa
ingredients.description: Complete protein grain rich in fiber and essential nutrients.

ingredients.name: Mixed Vegetables
ingredients.description: Fresh vegetables for nutrition and color.

recipe7.name: Chia Pudding
recipe7.description: Healthy breakfast pudding made with chia seeds, almond milk, and fresh fruits.

ingredients.name: Chia Seeds
ingredients.description: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and fiber.

ingredients.name: Almond Milk
ingredients.description: Dairy-free milk alternative rich in vitamin E.

recipe8.name: Bitter Gourd (Karela) Stir Fry
recipe8.description: A simple stir-fried dish made with bitter gourd, known for its blood sugar-lowering properties. Highly recommended for diabetic diets.

ingredients.name: Bitter Gourd (Karela)
ingredients.description: Powerful anti-diabetic vegetable known for reducing blood sugar levels naturally.

ingredients.name: Onion
ingredients.description: Adds sweetness and balances the bitterness of karela.

ingredients.name: Mustard Seeds
ingredients.description: Used for tempering; adds nutty aroma and supports digestion.

ingredients.name: Turmeric Powder
ingredients.description: Balances bitterness and boosts anti-inflammatory benefits.

ingredients.name: Groundnut Oil
ingredients.description: Light, stable oil suitable for stir-frying; diabetic-friendly when used in moderation.

recipe9.name: Cabbage and Palak Paratha (No Maida)
recipe9.description: Nutritious whole wheat flatbread stuffed with shredded cabbage and spinach (palak). High in fiber and iron.

ingredients.name: Whole Wheat Flour
ingredients.description: Healthy base for parathas; rich in fiber and low glycemic index.

ingredients.name: Cabbage
ingredients.description: Finely shredded cabbage adds crunch, fiber, and nutrients.

ingredients.name: Spinach (Palak)
ingredients.description: Iron-rich leafy green, great for immunity and blood sugar regulation.

ingredients.name: Ajwain (Carom Seeds)
ingredients.description: Helps digestion and adds aroma to parathas.

ingredients.name: Green Chilli
ingredients.description: Chopped green chilies add spice to the paratha stuffing.

recipe10.name: Quinoa Khichdi with Mixed Veggies
recipe10.description: A nutrient-rich, diabetic-friendly khichdi made with quinoa and assorted vegetables. Packed with protein, fiber, and antioxidants.

ingredients.name: Quinoa
ingredients.description: High-protein, gluten-free grain with low glycemic index; perfect rice substitute for khichdi.

ingredients.name: Moong Dal
ingredients.description: Easily digestible lentil rich in protein and low in carbs.

recipe11.name: Sprouted Moong Salad
recipe11.description: A refreshing, protein-rich salad made with sprouted green gram, veggies, and lemon juice. Great for diabetics and weight management.

ingredients.name: Sprouted Moong
ingredients.description: High-protein sprouted green gram rich in fiber and essential nutrients.

ingredients.name: Cucumber
ingredients.description: Adds freshness and hydration to the salad with very low calories.

ingredients.name: Tomato
ingredients.description: Juicy and tangy addition that boosts the salad's antioxidant value.

ingredients.name: Lemon
ingredients.description: Adds zing and helps with iron absorption from sprouts.

ingredients.name: Black Salt
ingredients.description: Used as a healthy seasoning; enhances flavor and aids digestion.

recipe12.name: Besan Cheela (Chickpea Pancake)
recipe12.description: Savory Indian pancakes made from chickpea flour, herbs, and spices. Naturally low in sugar and high in protein and fiber.

ingredients.name: Besan (Chickpea Flour)
ingredients.description: Gluten-free flour rich in protein and fiber; ideal for low sugar and diabetic-friendly meals.

ingredients.name: Onion
ingredients.description: Finely chopped onion adds crunch and flavor to cheela batter.

ingredients.name: Tomato
ingredients.description: Adds tangy taste and softness to the cheela.

ingredients.name: Green Chilli
ingredients.description: Adds mild heat and spice to the pancake batter.

ingredients.name: Carom Seeds (Ajwain)
ingredients.description: Aids digestion and adds a traditional Indian flavor.

recipe13.name: Cauliflower Rice Pulao
recipe13.description: A flavorful, low-carb pulao made using grated cauliflower instead of rice, mixed with spices and vegetables.

ingredients.name: Cauliflower
ingredients.description: Grated into rice-like texture; low in carbs and high in fiber, great rice substitute.

ingredients.name: Carrot
ingredients.description: Adds natural sweetness and color to the pulao without spiking sugar levels.

recipe14.name: Baingan Bharta (Roasted Eggplant Mash)
recipe14.description: Smoky-flavored mashed brinjal mixed with onion, tomato, and spices. A low-calorie, low-sugar North Indian side dish.

ingredients.name: Eggplant (Baingan)
ingredients.description: Roasted large brinjal, mashed for bharta. Low in carbs and calories.

ingredients.name: Onion
ingredients.description: Chopped finely to add texture and mild sweetness.

ingredients.name: Tomato
ingredients.description: Provides acidity and depth of flavor to mashed eggplant.

ingredients.name: Garlic
ingredients.description: Finely chopped garlic adds aroma and spice to bharta.

ingredients.name: Mustard Oil
ingredients.description: Traditional cooking oil used for an authentic bharta taste.

recipe15.name: Mushroom and Spinach Stir Fry
recipe15.description: Quick sautÃ©ed mushrooms and spinach in light spices. Low in sugar and rich in fiber, iron, and antioxidants.

ingredients.name: Button Mushrooms
ingredients.description: Low-carb, low-calorie fungi rich in umami flavor and B vitamins.

ingredients.name: Spinach (Palak)
ingredients.description: Rich in iron and fiber, balances texture and nutrition.

ingredients.name: Garlic
ingredients.description: Adds punchy flavor and improves digestion.

ingredients.name: Olive Oil
ingredients.description: Light and heart-healthy oil ideal for stir frying low sugar meals.

ingredients.name: Black Pepper
ingredients.description: Adds spice and antioxidant benefits without sugar.

recipe16.name: Coconut Flour Roti
recipe16.description: Gluten-free, low-carb roti made using coconut flour. A diabetic-friendly alternative to wheat rotis, rich in fiber and healthy fats.

ingredients.name: Coconut Flour
ingredients.description: Low-carb flour made from dried coconut pulp; rich in fiber and suitable for keto and low-sugar diets.

ingredients.name: Psyllium Husk (Isabgol)
ingredients.description: Natural fiber used to bind coconut flour dough; aids digestion and blood sugar control.

ingredients.name: Warm Water
ingredients.description: Used to form the dough; keeps the roti soft and pliable.

ingredients.name: Salt
ingredients.description: Enhances taste and balances natural sweetness from coconut flour.

recipe17.name: Palak Soup (Spinach Soup)
recipe17.description: A warm and comforting green soup made with spinach, garlic, and spices. Low in sugar and calories, high in iron and antioxidants.

ingredients.name: Spinach (Palak)
ingredients.description: Leafy green loaded with iron, calcium, and antioxidants. Perfect for diabetes-friendly diets.

ingredients.name: Garlic
ingredients.description: Boosts immunity, improves flavor, and has blood-sugar-regulating benefits.

ingredients.name: Black Pepper
ingredients.description: Adds mild spice and improves absorption of nutrients.

ingredients.name: Vegetable Stock
ingredients.description: Used as a flavorful base instead of cream or milk; keeps soup light and diabetic-safe.

recipe18.name: Tofu Bhurji (Scrambled Tofu Curry)
recipe18.description: A plant-based version of egg bhurji made with crumbled tofu, spices, and veggies. High in protein, low in sugar, and perfect for diabetic diets.

ingredients.name: Tofu
ingredients.description: High-protein, low-carb soybean paneer; ideal meat substitute for healthy scrambles.

ingredients.name: Onion
ingredients.description: Finely chopped for base flavor and light sweetness.

ingredients.name: Tomato
ingredients.description: Adds tang and moisture to scrambled tofu.

ingredients.name: Turmeric Powder
ingredients.description: Gives golden color and anti-inflammatory benefits.

ingredients.name: Coriander Leaves
ingredients.description: Fresh garnish for flavor and presentation.

recipe19.name: Stuffed Capsicum with Paneer & Veggies
recipe19.description: Bell peppers filled with a savory mix of paneer and vegetables, then baked or shallow-fried. Low in carbs and sugar, high in protein.

ingredients.name: Capsicum (Bell Pepper)
ingredients.description: Hollowed and used as a vessel for healthy fillings; low-calorie and colorful.

ingredients.name: Paneer (Low Fat)
ingredients.description: Grated fresh Indian cottage cheese; low-carb and protein-rich filling base.

ingredients.name: Carrot
ingredients.description: Finely chopped carrot adds crunch and mild sweetness.

ingredients.name: Garam Masala
ingredients.description: Classic Indian spice mix to enhance flavor depth.

ingredients.name: Olive Oil
ingredients.description: Used lightly for roasting or sautÃ©ing the capsicum; heart-healthy option.
